characterdesc-elf-alchemist:
Beneath the rust, rot, and fetid flesh lies potential. Raw, mutable, and waiting to be refined.

Druids are brilliant scholars that flourish in nature's laboratory. But, a sheltered life full of research brings inexperience in combat.
characterdesc-goblin-alchemist:
Beneath the rust, rot, and fetid flesh lies potential. Raw, mutable, and waiting to be refined.

Shamans through herbs and strange brews draw upon the life that hums throughout the world’s surface, distilling it into potions of healing, vigor, or ruin.
characterdesc-elf-artisan:
The world may crumble, but your work holds fast. Beauty is your defiance.

Artisans are talented individuals. Even when all hope is lost, they continue to create masterful works of art.
characterdesc-orc-hunter:
Making a fitting garb, so we may walk with grace once more.

Leatherworkers provide clothes and hides necessary to stay warm during the winter months.
characterdesc-human-oathbreaker:
To know the reason for your fall is, perhaps, to know the shape of things to come.

Oathkeepers have sworn themselves to The Forlorn Hope Order, seeking realms and powers immaterial to ours, but you have broken your sacred Oath, will you repent or continue down this path?
characterdesc-human-farmer:
While others sought answers underground, you planted them in rows; letting the seasons decide what was worth keeping.

Farmers are masters of the harvest that excel with rotating crops, turning barren soil into fertile land.
characterdesc-human-lumberjack:
The trees there creak in a silent tongue. You never spoke back, only answered with clean cuts and lasting craft, turning their silence into structure.

Skilled human carpenters are rivaled only by the dwarven deforestators and elven wardens in their particular set of skills and accompanying knowledge.
characterdesc-human-mason:
We built walls to keep the cold out. We laid bricks to shelter against the storms. Clay, lime, ash, and time. That's all it takes to keep the darkness out.

Masons are skilled craftsmen specialized in the manipulation of stone, clay, and binding agents.
characterdesc-goblin-scavenger:
The world may have changed, but people haven't. They might have swapped their gold for gears, but you know exactly where to find it.

Scavenger specialize in gathering wealth be it from ruins or simple trade.
characterdesc-dwarf-miner: The snaking corridors and creaking hums are like a second home to you. The stone like a second skin. You make your way where most other dwarfs fear to tread.
characterdesc-dwarf-smith:
Rock and Stone beneath your very feet speaks, if you have the patience to hear its secrets.

A Runesmith’s forge is a sanctum of silence broken only by hammer strikes and murmured chants. Their work is filled with reverence for the hidden power beneath the mountains.
characterdesc-human-smith:
Copper or lead, bismuth or zinc, you have never met a metal you could not tame. You hear it sing in every hammer-blow. You feel it bloom with every stoke of the forge.

Blacksmiths are talented laborers, capable of shaping metal into whatever they need.
characterdesc-elf-smith:
You've heard its siren call even from the deepest of forests. Fire tests all things. Only what endures is worthy of a name.

Among elves, Forgemasters are rare craftsmen who turn from grove and glade to the deep song of metal and flame.
characterdesc-dwarf-hunter:
Loose the arrow, kill the beast.

Hunters are ranged specialists that excel in the wild forests, plains, and mountains. They struggle in the confined tunnels of the underground compared to other dwarfs.
characterdesc-dwarf-clockmaker:
The machines never stop ticking down there. You’ve seen to that.
You can hear them in your sleep.

Engineers are masters of precision and systems. They can easily dismantle or repair machinery
characterdesc-goblin-clockmaker:
The machines never stop ticking down there. You’ve seen to that.
You can hear them in your sleep.

Gadgeteers are masters of precision and systems. They can easily dismantle or repair machinery
characterdesc-orc-blackguard:
Fight if you must. Kill if you must. Don’t look away.
A hard gaze on life will see you through.

Blackguards are fierce soldiers that thrive in a close-ranged skirmish, but a life of conflict has its downsides: They have no talent for delicate work and need more food to maintain their strength.
characterdesc-elf-orchardkeeper:
The sweetest fruit comes from patient hands and whispered prayers.

Orchard Keepers are elves who have devoted their lives to the cultivation of fruit-bearing trees, berry bushes and the delicate ecosystems that nurture them
characterdesc-elf-wardenofthewoods:
Every fallen tree must serve the forest’s song.

Wardens of the Woods are the vigilant stewards of the wild - hunters, trackers, and woodsmen who maintain the balance between growth and decay.
characterdesc-dwarf-lumberjack:
The trees there creak in a silent tongue. You never spoke back, only answered with clean cuts and lasting craft, turning their silence into structure.

Deforestator are skilled carpenters and unrivaled lumberjacks.
characterdesc-orc-smith:
Every spark from the hammer is a memory - every blade, a promise kept.

Ironmongers are orcs whose strength and spirit are bound to the forge. Their work carries a harsh beauty: brutal efficiency forged with reverence. Whether shaping armor for war or hinges for homesteads, their touch leaves a mark of endurance that few can match.
traitdesc-alchemist: Has the ability to craft potions, prima materia and an alternative recipe for terra preta
traitdesc-artisan: Exclusive craftable wallpapers, and can glaze Raw storage vessels, Raw flowerpots, Raw planters, and cheaper recipes for clay and mortar. Can also craft Refurbished crocks
traitdesc-bowyer: Exclusive craftable bows and crude arrows
traitdesc-culinary: Exclusive craftable Vintage beef, and metal cooking pots
traitdesc-shelflifesavant: Exclusive craftable rosin that doubles the longevity of food sealed in refurbished crocks
traitdesc-tinkerer: Exclusive craftable device to tame locusts and mechanical contraptions
traitdesc-pioneer: Exclusive craftable soil boosters and a better recipe for terra preta and high fertility soil
traitdesc-carpenter: Exclusive craftable wagon wheels, paper lanterns, artisan planks, aged firewood, aged logs, treasure chests, and better recipes (if in dappled groves is not enabled) for sticks, firewood, and boards
traitdesc-packmule: Exclusive craftable Upgraded backpacks with lanterns
traitdesc-prospector: Exclusive craftable mining lanterns, copper pan, cheaper blasting powder recipes, cheaper bomb recipes and cheaper ashlar blocks recipes
traitdesc-shelteredstone: No temporal stability loss whilst underground, no matter how deep.
traitdesc-clairvoyance: Able to use the crystal skull to find broken static translocators
traitdesc-steelmaker: Exclusive craftable Iron doors, T2,T3 refractory bricks
traitdesc-recycler: Can break down rusty gears, metal scraps, and metal parts for metals of that type
traitdesc-tallowtanner: Can recycle unused pelts into scraped hides
traitdesc-zealot: Exclusive craftable Temporal cloth, Forlorn Hope gear and a cheaper recipe for prima materia
charattribute-stickDropRate-0.5: +50% chance to get double sticks from branches
charattribute-cropDropRate-0.3: +30% chance to get extra crops on harvest
charattribute-cropDropRate--0.15: -15% chance to get extra crops on harvest
charattribute-armorWalkSpeedAffectedness: walk speed penalty for wearing armor reduced by 15%
walk speed penalty for wearing armor reduced by 25%
walk speed penalty for wearing armor increased by 25%
charattribute-armorManipulationSpeedAffe: manipulation speed penalty for wearing armor increased by 25%
charattribute-armorWalkSpeedAffectedness: walk speed penalty for wearing armor increased by 5%
charattribute-wholeVesselLootChance-0.2: 20% chance to collect cracked vessels intact
charattribute-fruittreeDropRate-1: Double fruit tree cutting drop rate
charattribute-caveStabilityLoss-0.2: +20% faster temporal stability loss in caves
charattribute-caveStabilityLoss--0.2: +20% slower temporal stability loss in caves
charattribute-surfaceStabilityLoss--0.00: Gradual temporal stability loss when outside or when not in a room
aldraces:modeldesc-dwarf: The depths are home; the surface, unfamiliar. Stout folk with mountain fire in their veins. Masters of stone and metal, whose endurance is legendary.
aldraces:modeldesc-elf: Graceful long-lived beings with magic in their blood. Their bond with nature is only matched by their pride.
aldraces:modeldesc-goblin: Nimble-fingered troublemakers with empty pockets. Where goblins go, chaos, theft and questionable inventions follow.
aldraces:modeldesc-human: Adaptable and ambitious. Their short lives are compensated by an uncanny ability to conquer new lands.
aldraces:modeldesc-ork: Musclebound brutes with tusks. Born for war, they see beauty only in strength and loud explosions.
